酒瓶的秘密, 酒后吐真言, 真言, 酒瓶里的真相
乡村餐酒, 地区餐酒, 地区葡萄酒

sentences.sentence: So beware wine scammers. Because even at the atomic level, in vino veritas.
sentences.translation: 所以造假酒的人注意了哦，即使是原子也会酒后吐真言的。

sentences.sentence: But too much of it gives vino a harsh "green" taste that clashes with other flavors.
sentences.translation: 不过过多的苹果酸使红酒有涩口的“草青味”，与其他味道冲突。

sentences.sentence: And on those days when they sipped on a bit too much vino they devoured deep Fried canaries.
sentences.translation: 那时候当他们喝了太多了葡萄酒的话他们就会狼吞虎咽的吃油炸金丝雀。
